ResourceHeader.Description:
Geomagnetic Data at the Tromsø Geophysical Observatory which is a part of the  
		  Faculty of Science and Technology, UiT, at The Arctic University of Norway.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge: UiT The Arctic University of Norway

InformationURL.Name: Tromsø Geophysical Observatory
InformationURL.Description: Requestion form for magnetometer data, plots, indices, maps, etc.

OperatingSpan.Note:
Effective 1. January 2000 this group was separated from the 
			Department of Physics and established as a unit directly under the 
			Faculty of Science and Mathematics given the name 'Tromsø 
			Geophysical Observatory' (TGO).
